00010 #if !defined(MATRIX_H)
00011 #define MATRIX_H
00012 
00013 #include <sstream>
00014 #include <iomanip>
00015 
00016 #include "Vector.H"

00018 namespace VecMath {
00024     template <unsigned D, typename N = double> class Matrix {
00025         public:
00026             Matrix<D, N> ();
00027             Matrix<D, N> (N, N, N, N, N, N);
00028             Matrix<D, N> (unsigned, unsigned, N);
00029             virtual ~Matrix<D, N> () { }
00030 
00035             N &operator () (unsigned i, unsigned j) { return M[i][j]; }
00036 
00037             Matrix<D, N> operator * (const Matrix<D, N> &) const;
00038             Vector<D, N> operator * (const Vector<D, N> &);
00039 
00040             Matrix<D, N> operator - ();
00041 
00042             std::string Print ();
00043 
00044         private:
00046             N M[D][D];
00047     };
00048 
00049 
00051     template<unsigned D, typename N> Matrix<D, N>::Matrix () {
00052         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                                      //      i: row
00053             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)                            //      j: col
00054                 M[i][j] = 0;
00055             M[i][i] = 1;
00056         }
00057     }
00058 
00066     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00067             Matrix<D, N>::Matrix (N Rxy, N Rxz, N Rxw, N Ryz, N Ryw, N Rzw) {
00068         std::cerr << "Matrix<" << D <<">::Matrix<" << D
00069                   <<"> (Rxy, Rxz, Rxw, Ryz, Ryw, Rzw) not yet implemented!"
00070                   << std::endl;
00071         abort();
00072     }
00073 
00078     template<unsigned D, typename N>
00079             Matrix<D, N>::Matrix (unsigned ii, unsigned jj, N Theta) {
00080         N c = cos (Theta*pi/180.), s = sin (Theta*pi/180.);
00081         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                                      //      i: row
00082             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)                            //      j: col
00083                 M[i][j] = 0;
00084             M[i][i] = 1;
00085         }
00086         M[ii][ii] =  M[jj][jj] = c;
00087         M[ii][jj] = -s;
00088         M[jj][ii] = s;
00089     }
00090 
00094     template <unsigned D, typename N> Matrix<D, N>
00095             Matrix<D, N>::operator * (const Matrix<D, N> &B) const {
00096         Matrix<D, N> C;
00097         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)                                        //      i: row
00098             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) {                          //      j: col
00099                 N s = 0;
00100                 for (unsigned k = 0; k < D; k++)
00101                     s += M[i][k]*B.M[k][j];
00102                 C.M[i][j] = s;
00103             }
00104         return C;
00105     }
00106 
00110     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00111             Vector<D, N> Matrix<D, N>::operator * (const Vector<D, N> &V) {
00112         Vector<D, N> W;
00113         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                              //      i: row
00114             N s = 0;
00115             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)                    //      j: col
00116                 s += M[i][j]*V[j];
00117             W[i] = s;
00118         }
00119         return W;
00120     }
00121 
00124     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00125             Matrix<D, N> Matrix<D, N>::operator - () {
00126         Matrix<D, N> B (*this);
00127         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)                                        //      i: row
00128             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) {                          //      j: col
00129                 B.M[i][j] = -M[i][j];
00130             }
00131         return B;
00132     }
00133 
00134 
00136     template <unsigned D, typename N> std::string Matrix<D, N>::Print () {
00137         std::ostringstream o;
00138         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00139             o << "|";
00140             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)
00141                 o << std::setw (10) << std::setprecision (3) << M[i][j];
00142             o << "|\n";
00143         }
00144         o << std::ends;
00145         return o.str ();
00146     }

00148 }       // namespace VecMath
